article.title: Northrop Grumman to Provide Mortar Warning Equipment
article.text: Northrop Grumman, Herndon, Virginia, was awarded a $6,990,140 modification (P00039) to contract W31P4Q-12-C-0029 to acquire Rocket Artillery Mortar Warn Equipment for 2-44 Air Defense Artillery fielding six platoons. The Army Contracting Command, Redstone Arsenal, Alabama, is the contracting activity.
